attributes.action: Place fox hounds on the dangerous breed list
attributes.additional_details: The fox hound is bred solely to hunt and kill. It is not found inside a family home but kept outside in kennels because it is not a suitable pet. Although fox hunting is banned, participants state they are unable to control a pack of hounds should they come across a fox. Could they control a pack bred to hunt and kill if they happened upon a child out on a family trip?
